I really would like to see the one about disproving conspiracy theorists...

I could do that if you guys wanted me to .

I could do that if you guys wanted me to .

Oh, I'd love to see something like that.

Just do your research carefully before making it. Conspiracy theorists are a crazy bunch.

Oh, I'd love to see something like that.

Just do your research carefully before making it. Conspiracy theorists are a crazy bunch.

Oh I know- the catch about them is their not only lunar consps... but also Shuttle-ISS-Alien-Area 52-Life isn't real... blah blah blah.
So any other suggestions?

So any other suggestions?

Experimental rocket engines, both from the past, present, and the near-future, of all types. Something like NERVA or the recent VASIMR is decent, but if you can find designs that go beyond insane, I think it'd be much better.

Experimental rocket engines, both from the past, present, and the near-future, of all types. Something like NERVA or the recent VASIMR is decent, but if you can find designs that go beyond insane, I think it'd be much better.

Ooo very good idea! I will!

Oh I know- the catch about them is their not only lunar consps... but also Shuttle-ISS-Alien-Area 52-Life isn't real... blah blah blah.

Just a warning, they are nearly impossible to reason with. From a few hundred of them, only 1 was able to get persuaded that his idea was false. The rest thought the government was paying me, or that the evidence was made up.

Just a warning, they are nearly impossible to reason with. From a few hundred of them, only 1 was able to get persuaded that his idea was false. The rest thought the government was paying me, or that the evidence was made up.

I know and I'll mention those groups in my video.

Oh wow. This has gotten a lot of attention. I, myself, am in need of someone to assist me. Mainly because finding decent pictures is hard. And I'm doing a lot of work in recording, editing(much harder then it seems) and just dealing with life in general. Help would be nice.

Oh wow. This has gotten a lot of attention. I, myself, am in need of someone to assist me. Mainly because finding decent pictures is hard. And I'm doing a lot of work in recording, editing(much harder then it seems) and just dealing with life in general. Help would be nice.

Indeed! Help wanted will be added to the thread title. As we DO NEED IT.

If either of you want either some research assistance, or the occasional digital animation, I am available if I get a warning of at least a few days (depending of course on the complexity of the project, animations sometimes take a few days to render, let alone design).

If either of you want either some research assistance, or the occasional digital animation, I am available if I get a warning of at least a few days (depending of course on the complexity of the project, animations sometimes take a few days to render, let alone design).

Well maybe some pics for SRG about Lunar Consps... nothing specific. Maybe they're design of a "empty shuttle" and ISS... But I will need them for the latter videos.

I can provide you with some good information about Laika and other soviet space dogs. I have a great book with a lot of information on the subject. I also have a chronological list of all the soviet dogs that were sent up into space.

I can also do graphics for your show if you are interested. Logos, Text, Banners, whatever really.

I can also do graphics for your show if you are interested. Logos, Text, Banners, whatever really.

Yes please on the help!

Also I have read up on the dogs HOWEVER ANY help is GREATLY appreciated!

Off-topic: Anyone here think I should do some SCP report readings? I know of a guy on YT who does things like it called, The Volgun.

Think I should?
